metadata.title: CVE-2015-8980 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The plural form formula in ngettext family of calls in php-gettext before1.0.12 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8980` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-gettext - 1.0.12-0.1
php-php-gettext - 1.0.12-0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-gettext package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.12-0.1').
